```{r "setup", include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = "..")
source("setup.R")
codings = getCodes()
```
## Preparation
The data is the RQDA codings. To start, retrieve codings and descriptions, and tidy-up.
```{r}
str(codings, vec.len = 1, nchar.max = 80)
```

## Code frequency tables
### Subcode frequency (with descriptions)
```{r}
codings %>% 
  group_by(codename) %>% 
  summarise(n = n(), description = first(description)) %>% 
  select(n, codename, description)

```
### Code frequency
```{r}
codings %>% 
  group_by(category, code) %>% 
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  mutate(cat.code = paste(category, "-", code, sep = "")) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(n, cat.code)
```
### Category frequency
```{r}
codings %>% 
  group_by(category) %>% 
  summarise(n = n(), memo = first(category.desc)) %>% 
  select(n, category, memo)
```
